description: The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC), Saskatoon Research and Development Centre, Saskatoon, Saskatchewan has a requirement for the supply and delivery of one (1) spray chamber in accordance with the specifications identified herein. The spray chamber will be used to deliver pesticides to plant and soil material deposited below the spray nozzle in a controlled environment within the Saskatoon Research and Development Centre.

<figure markdown>
## 01R11-220954 - Request for Proposal for a Spray Chamber. [RÉÉMISSION]
#### Key Details
| Field | Date or Value | Note |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | WS3442340896 |  |
| Tender Closing Date | January 13, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time | This date is binding. Late bids will not be accepted. |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 2022-10-03 | Applied to proposals received in the review period. |

### Background: Purpose and Scope of Work
The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food's (AAFC) Saskatoon Research and Development Centre in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan aims to procure one (1) spray chamber in accordance with the specifications outlined below. The proposed supply and delivery of the spray chamber will facilitate controlling-developments of controlled environments within the research centre where plant and soil material can be sprayed.

### Specifications
* Category: Dispersing and spraying appliances for agriculture
* UNSPSC: *21101800*

The specifications are included in the Request for Proposal document available at the following link:

* <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14826563?extsite=MTQ4MjY1NjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Respondents Information
#### Contact Person
* Jill Aquino (elle-la / she-her) - [jill.aquino@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jill.aquino@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Specifications for Bidding Documents
Please provide a completed Request for Proposal, supporting documentation, and the bid submission by January 13, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time. All non-complaint bids will result in rejected bids. The tender status has been modified from "expired" (0) to have any provisional bids.
